properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 8:44PM CST until January 5 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until Saturday January 4.
* At 7 PM Friday the stage was 14.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 14.7 feet on Saturday January 4.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Friday January 3 and will
continue rising to near 14.7 feet by Saturday January 4. The river
will fall below flood stage Saturday January 4.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding of low-lying agricltural land is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Saturday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
